question: Many people have difficulty maintaining a healthy diet.What are the causes of this problem?  How could it be solved?
text: It is concluded that many human beings have difficulty maintaining a healthy diet which I found to be true as there are events that surround negligence of eating well. which I would be emphasizing in my paragraph below.

For instance, Inflation in food prices, scarcity, poverty, poor farming et cetera. There is a numerous number of unemployments men and women in the country which is also one of the main causes of poor ingestion and so on.
